Label: Purpose
Date Range: To power other time widgets that use a date range.

Label: Entry Guidelines
Date Range: Enter a start date and end date in the Solr date range field convention. In JSON, the value should be formatted as a string that includes the brackets, rather than as an array or list containing a string. Incorrect: ["YYYY TO YYYY"]. Correct: "[YYYY TO YYYY]".

Label: Commentary
Date Range: This field is not yet supported by GeoBlacklight, but the application can be customized to use it.
